title: Oak milk releases Redskins, Jaffas and Chokito flavoured drinks
text:
Oak milk has released Redskins, Jaffas and Chokito flavoured drinks to pay homage to some of Australia's most iconic lollies.

The brand, which is famous for their delicious chocolate milk variety, launched the dairy goods into Woolworths stores for just $3.05 a carton.

It comes just a few months after Oak released a cinnamon doughnut milk that reportedly 'tasted like eggnog'.

Oak milk has released Redskins, Jaffas and Chokito flavoured drinks to pay homage to some of Australia's most iconic lollies

Excited fans of the legendary sweets are eager to get their hands on the sugary goodness, which can be found at the supermarket store nationwide.

'I feel like I'm 12 again and getting on my bike to go down to the milk bar,' one person wrote online.

'The Chokito one sounds awesome,' added another.

But some people were confused about the flavours: 'The jury's out on the Redskins one... that's just weird!'

Redskins are a red, raspberry-flavoured chewy confectionery that comes in the shape of a log. It used to be marketed alongside Milko Sticks because they looked so similar, only Milkos are white.

Meanwhile Jaffas are small round sweets that have soft chocolate centre with a hard covering of orange flavoured, red coloured lolly.

Meanwhile Jaffas are small round sweets that have soft chocolate centre with a hard covering of orange flavoured, red coloured lolly

And who can forget the Chokito, a chocolate bar with caramel fudge and crisped rice inside of it.

All three options are likely going to be a hit once news about the flavours spread but for now it's a fairly unknown new item.

You can also purchase standard chocolate, banana and strawberry flavours of Oak milk at the same grocer.
description: Oak milk has released Red Skins, Jaffas and Chokito flavoured drinks to pay homage to some of Australia's most iconic lollies.
authors: Matilda Rudd For Daily Mail Australia
